li.a: Spotlight on Teachers Leading - Remote Learning

div.p: We recognize that not all students in Maine have access to the internet and we are working swiftly to address this.Â Some companies are offering free internet access options for a limited time to help promote connectivity for remote learning. Nationally, many internet companies have signed the Keep Americans Connected Pledge which allows for flexibility and payment waivers, as well as free access to broadband services for a limited time.Â
